TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RouteHandlerFilterDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function RouteHandlerFilterDelegate(context As RouteHandlerInvocationContext) As ValueTask(Of Object)
type RouteHandlerFilterDelegate = delegate of RouteHandlerInvocationContext -> ValueTask<obj>

Docs.param: The associated with the current request.
Docs.summary: A delegate that is applied as a filter on a route handler.
Docs.returns: A result of calling the handler and applying any modifications made by filters in the pipeline.
